column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////(Reply to Owner) Hi Jimmy
column2: I'm glad you read my review and replied with what you thought of it. And I
column3: wholeheartedly understand where you're coming from and why you believe your price is just. I'm not saying that the Ramen wasn't made professionally
column4: nor am I saying the Ramen I had was overpriced in any way. My goal is to provide information for your future customers about what they could expect
column5: as they could come from all sorts of places and some wouldn't know the regular prices for Japanese Cuisine or the range of prices depending on the location. And I
column6: understanding your concern did make some minor adjustments to my review without changing how I thought upon the food and price. Hope you'll see this
